magenta-day_one-default.text: Dr Pink, your tardiness has been noted
magenta-day_one-default.speaker: magenta

meeting_day_one-yes.text: (You have decided to sacrifice innocent lives to try to stop the moon)
meeting_day_one-yes.speaker: magenta

meeting_day_one-no.text: (You have decided to not sacrifice innocent lives)
meeting_day_one-no.speaker: magenta
